data.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food processing Enterprises Scheme (PMFME)  - Training and Development  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides training support for marketing & branding and specific training designed for ODOP product or the product produced by the unit including operations of necessary machines.
data.eligibility: All individual micro units and units formed group arre eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The applicant must be dealing in ODOP products.
Online modules would be used for the general training applicable to all Units.
data.beneficiaries: All individual micro units and units formed group arre eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The applicant must be dealing in ODOP products.
Online modules would be used for the general training applicable to all Units.
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Food Processing Industries, Rural Self Employment Training Institutes (RSETI) and other institutions at the district level
data.context: This scheme is introduced to Support for transition of existing 2,00,000 enterprises into formal framework.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increased access for the enterprises, to professional and technical support.
data.description:
Scheme provides training support for marketing & branding and specific training designed for ODOP product or the product produced by the unit including operations of necessary machines.
Handholding support will also be provided.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://pmfme.mofpi.gov.in/pmfme/#/Register-New-User
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. GST Certificate 
3. Financials for Last 2 years 
4. Projected financial data 
5. Lending Bank Details 
6. Basic KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Panchsheel Bhawan, 
August Kranti Marg,
Khelgaon, New Delhi-110049

Email id: support-pmfme@mofpi.gov.in  
Contact Details: 011-26406500
data.beneficiary: Food Processing Industry  - SHGs, Co-Operative, Others  - All Location  - Micro
